https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Kj9JAhMNSektw6RVYR1oJWGZWa.jpg Chico is a young piano player with big dreams. Rita is a beautiful singer with an extraordinary voice. Music and romantic desire unites them, but their journey - in the tradition of the Latin ballad, the bolero - brings heartache and torment. Chico & Rita
